front.title: Creating File System Object Attachments with MIME

abstract.t: This memo defines a new top level type for MIME and its subtypes and mappings to file types. The intent of this draft is to both define a new comprehensive top level type and define a method and usage for one of the to be defined subtypes. This new subtype in itself is a media type. The purpose of which provides a mechanism to move a structured set of files system object structures (directories and/or files) as a MIME attachment from one environment to another while preserving common elements.
